How Stanford responded to an elite East Coast college’s move to end legacy admissions

Stanford University says it will continue its current policy of “holistic” admissions decisions that consider all aspects of an applicant’s record after Amherst College said Tuesday it is ending a longstanding policy giving preference to applicants whose parents graduated from the school.
